text: Archibald E. Gough (born 16 March 1883; date of death unknown) was an English footballer who played for FC Basel as a midfielder. Between 1900 and 1902 Gough played a total of 12 games for Basel, without scoring a goal. Four of these games were in the Swiss Serie A and eight were friendly games. He was the first English person to play for the club, in fact to date remains the only English player to play for Basel. ==Sources and References== * Rotblau: Jahrbuch Saison 2017/2018. Publisher: FC Basel Marketing AG. * Verein "Basler Fussballarchiv" Homepage Category:FC Basel players Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:1883 births Category:Year of death missing
title: Archibald E. Gough
